recipe_name: Mexican Chicken and Rice Soup (Sopa de Pollo y Arroz)
ingredients: 2   +   1/2 quarts chicken stock, 2 pounds skin-on, bone-in whole chicken legs (drumsticks and thighs), 3  carrots, chopped, 1  white onion, chopped, 2 stalks celery, chopped,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 1 clove garlic, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint,   salt and ground black pepper to taste, 3 cups cooked rice, 1  avocado, peeled and chopped, 2  serrano peppers, minced, 2  limes, quartered
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 4g 18%, Cholesterol 65mg 22%, Sodium 957mg 42%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 10%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 22g, Vitamin C 12mg 59%, Calcium 49mg 4%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 450mg 10%
